==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial|Outrider Style}}

==Walkthrough==
# Enter Raptor's Hideout
# Continue ahead to activate a Door of Resurrection and defeat opponents
#*{{Enemy|Cryo Hilichurl Shooter|x=2}}
#* {{Enemy|Hilichurl Shooter|x=4}}
#* {{Enemy|Electro Hilichurl Shooter|x=5}}
#* {{Enemy|Pyro Hilichurl Shooter|x=5}}
#* Use the nearby Wind Currents to {{Color|menu|keep yourself afloat}} while evading enemy attacks.
#* While {{Color|menu|gliding}}, you can {{Color|menu|drop bombs}}. Defeat all opponents this way.
#* When the player is on the ground, they will be unable to attack. Use the nearby Wind Currents to glide again.
# Activate the Door of Resurrection
# Glide to the next location
# Defeat opponents
#* {{Enemy|Cryo Hilichurl Shooter|x=2}}
#* {{Enemy|Hilichurl Shooter|x=3}}
#* {{Enemy|Pyro Hilichurl Shooter|x=6}}
#* {{Enemy|Electro Hilichurl Shooter|x=8}}
#* Amber joins you as a trial character after defeating the opponents
# Activate the Door of Resurrection
# Glide over to the next location
# Activate the Door of Resurrection
# Defeat opponent
#* {{Enemy|Pyro Hilichurl Shooter|x=1}}
# Proceed to the next room via stairs
#* There are two Common Chests, one covered in thorn bushes and the other can be accessed by breaking a wall
# Destroy the power source to unlock the mechanism
#* Use Pyro to disable the Electro power sources on the walls
# Interact with the console to open the door
# Proceed to the next room and activate the Door of Resurrection
#* There is a Common Chest covered in thorn bushes to the left of the entrance
# Defeat opponents
#* {{Enemy|Cryo Slime|x=1}}
#* {{Enemy|Electro Slime|x=1}}
#* {{Enemy|Cryo Hilichurl Shooter|x=1}}
#* {{Enemy|Hilichurl Shooter|x=2}}
#* {{Enemy|Electro Hilichurl Shooter|x=3}}
# Interact with the console to activate a wind current
# Use the wind current to glide to the next destination
#* There is a Common Chest to the side
# Defeat opponents
#* {{Enemy|Cryo Hilichurl Shooter|x=1}}
#* {{Enemy|Electro Hilichurl Shooter|x=1}}
#* There is a Common Chest to the left of the hilichurls
# Interact with the console to open the door
# Glide over to the platform
# Glide over the chasm
# Activate the Door of Resurrection
# Defeat opponents
#* {{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Raptor|text=Raptor — Flying Thief On The Horizon}}
#* {{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Cryo Potioneer|x=1}}
#* {{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Gravedigger|x=1}}
#* {{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Scout|x=1}}
# Leave domain
#* A Precious Chest appears after the cutscene
